_header: Cometh ye children me for to hearen
Subjects: translations; scripture texts, Engl. trans. of
_description: A translation of ‘Venite filii audite me…’ (Ps. 33.12) — one couplet following this text in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Comet ȝe children me for to herenÞe dred of God I sal
                    ȝou leren
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 16.
